title: Grammys 2017: Paris Jackson returns 8 years after dad Michael Jackson’s death | music | Hindustan Times
text:
Grammys 2017: Paris Jackson returns 8 years after dad Michael Jackson’s death 
Michael Jackson’s daughter Paris Jackson returned to the Grammys eight years after the superstar’s death. music Updated: Feb 13, 2017 07:50 IST AP Paris Jackson made a stunning appearance at the Grammys on Monday. 
Paris Jackson has returned to Staples Center for the Grammys eight years after attending her father’s memorial service at the Los Angeles arena. Read more Grammys 2017 red carpet- Adele to Katy Perry: See all the best dressed stars 
In 2009, Jackson was 11 years old and surrounded by her extended family when she told the crowd, “Daddy has been the best father you could ever imagine, and I just want to say I love him so much.” 
Now 18, the only daughter of the late Michael Jackson introduced a performance by The Weeknd featuring Daft Punk. 
She wore flowers in her blond hair and sported a nose ring. Paris Jackson introduces a performance by The Weeknd and Daft Punk at the 59th annual Grammy Awards on Sunday. (AP) 
“We can really use this kind of excitement at a pipeline protest you guys,” she told the audience. “Everyone looks so beautiful, especially Beyonce.” 
Follow @htshowbiz for more
